subject: p16662264
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph from, there is substantial improvement of the pre-existing pneumonia. On the current image, small foci of remnant pneumonia are seen in the pericardiac areas of the lingula, and on the lateral image, in the middle lobe. There is no evidence of complications, notably no pleural effusion or lymphadenopathy. Otherwise, the lung parenchyma is normal. There is no hilar or mediastinal abnormality. Normal size and shape of the cardiac silhouette.
